resources.string: By continuing, you agree to the Terms Of Service \nAnd acknowledge the Privacy Policy

"Built upon Firebase Cloud Messaging, Fatalk demonstrate chat communication in real-time. It supports text,image,gif,audio and video messages.

You can access the full code at : Fatalk Android 
And the backend code at : Fatalk Backend. You can find these links in App Full Description on PlayStore. 

Fatalk is anonymous but the Messages in Fatalk are NOT end-to-end encrypted which makes it NOT suitable for any personal usage.
